Tackle.name: Tackle
Tackle.describtion: Charges the target and slams it with full-body.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.describtion: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.describtion: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

Headbutt.name: Headbutt
Headbutt.describtion: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.describtion: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

TakeDown.name: Take Down
TakeDown.describtion: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe.

SkullBash.name: Skull Bash
SkullBash.describtion: The user head-butts the foe at full steam.

Scratch.name: Scratch
Scratch.describtion: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

Cut.name: Cut
Cut.describtion: The target is cut with a scythe or a claw.

CrushClaw.name: CrushClaw
CrushClaw.describtion: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws.

Swift.name: Swift
Swift.describtion: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team.

QuickAttack.name: Quick Attack
QuickAttack.describtion: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Covet.name: Covet
Covet.describtion: The user endearingly approaches the target, then smacks it.

EarOrTailSlap.name: Ear/Tail Slap
EarOrTailSlap.describtion: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail or big ears. It hits the creature two to five times in a row.

Judgment.name: Judgment
Judgment.describtion: The user releases countless shots of light at the target.

BodySlam.name: Body Slam
BodySlam.describtion: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight.
